amendment.description: To strike the pilot program on disclosure of records under the Privacy Act relating to certain intelligence activities.

action.text: Senate vitiated previous passage on amendment SA 859.

vote.text: Amendment SA 859 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 859 proposed by Senator Rockefeller for Senator Bond to Amendment SA 843. (consideration: CR S4559-4560, S4560-4562; text: CR S4561) To strike the pilot program on disclosure of records under the Privacy Act relating to certain intelligence activities.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 859 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 859 proposed by Senator Rockefeller for Senator Bond to Amendment SA 843.
